title: gbman~
description: `gbman~` is a chaotic audio generator based on the gingerbread man map difference equation, `y[n] = 1 + abs(y[n-1]) - y[n-2]`. It produces a filtered and rescaled audio signal, with its chaotic behavior controlled by a frequency input and initial feedback values for `y[n-1]` and `y[n-2]`. It supports multichannel operation and allows dynamic adjustment of its parameters.
